issue.title: Users' credentials not updated after loading an authentication script

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.title: Do not remove users when changing auth method

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Change AuthenticationMethodType to expose the type of the credentials
it creates to allow to check if existing users' credentials need to be
reset, also, remove API related code that removed the users.
Update AuthenticationMethodType implementations for the above changes.
Change AuthenticationAPI and ContextAuthenticationPanel to no longer
remove the existing users when changing the authentication methods,
instead reset their credentials if different type.

Fix #1067 - User conversion between changes of AuthenticationMethods

issue.title: Update authentication method behaviour on change

repository.name: zap-core-help
repository.description: The help files for the ZAP core

issue.body:
Update release notes (for API endpoint) and the Session Context
Authentication screen to mention that the users are no longer deleted
when the authentication method is changed.

Part of zaproxy/zaproxy#1067 - User conversion between changes of
AuthenticationMethods

body: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
